nodes.text: The Magra Monad was a gigantic residential building found in the Yaam Sector of Coruscant's Galactic City, at the intersection of Bellus Boulevard and Zyra Street. Standing a thousand stories tall, the Magra Monad was a self-contained arcology that provided everything its tenants needed to exist. The only thing that the Magra Monad did not generate itself was gravity, although it was rumored that many residents wanted to generate their own.
